name: Millies
description: Named after Eldorado owner and founder Don Carano's mother, Millies is downtown Reno's hotspot for delicious breakfast favorites featuring family recipes. Guests can visit the Sweet Shoppe & Bakery for fresh-roasted Eldorado coffee, chocolate sweets, classic milkshakes, and fresh-churned creamy gelato. A down-home coffee shop menu makes Millies the perfect spot to meet friends.
shortDescription: Family-recipe breakfast spot with Sweet Shoppe, gelato, and fresh-roasted coffee at the Eldorado.
hours: Mon 7am - 2pm | Tue & Wed Closed | Thu - Sun 7am - 2pm

faqs.question: What kind of food does Millies serve?
faqs.answer: Breakfast favorites with family recipes, plus the Sweet Shoppe & Bakery with gelato, milkshakes, and pastries.

faqs.question: Who is Millies named after?
faqs.answer: Eldorado founder Don Carano's mother, Millie.

faqs.question: When is Millies open?
faqs.answer: Monday and Thursday through Sunday, 7am to 2pm. Closed Tuesday and Wednesday.

meta.title: Millies – Breakfast & Sweet Shoppe at Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Enjoy family-recipe breakfasts, fresh gelato, and classic milkshakes at Millies in Eldorado Resort, downtown Reno.

testimonials.quote: Golf the High Sierra arranged our group dinner at Millies and it was a highlight of the trip. Great atmosphere, excellent food, and they accommodated all our dietary needs.
testimonials.author: Scott K.

testimonials.quote: Had dinner at Millies after our round and it was fantastic. Great food, attentive service, and they handled our group of 16 without a hitch. GTHS recommended it and they were spot on.
testimonials.author: Julie S.
